agentCard.name: Audit Elk Stack Agent
agentCard.description: Event logging and searching for PlugPipe audit events using Elasticsearch. For infrastructure management (ILM, Logstash, Kibana), use specialized plugins (elk_ilm_manager, elk_logstash_manager, elk_kibana_manager)
